query:
SELECT 
  'REVENUE' as Type,
  id,
  description,
  ROUND(amount, 2) as Amount,
  revenueType as Category,
  revenueDate as Date,
  paymentStatus as Status
FROM revenue
ORDER BY revenueDate DESC
LIMIT 15;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2kNF22PapS9mysw.root --database WZQk4bD8DnsRHwYBkmh7FN --execute 
SELECT 
  'REVENUE' as Type,
  id,
  description,
  ROUND(amount, 2) as Amount,
  revenueType as Category,
  revenueDate as Date,
  paymentStatus as Status
FROM revenue
ORDER BY revenueDate DESC
LIMIT 15;
